remarks: The set in the supremum of the operator norm definition ~ df-nmoo is a set of reals.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Nov-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nmosetre.2 $e |- Y = ( BaseSet ` W ) $.
nmosetre.4 $e |- N = ( normCV ` W ) $.
nmosetre $p |- ( ( W e. NrmCVec /\ T : X --> Y ) -> { x | E. z e. X ( ( M ` z ) <_ 1 /\ x = ( N ` ( T ` z ) ) ) } C_ RR ) $.
$d T x z $.
$d W x z $.
$d X x z $.
$d Y x z $.
